sentences.en: ...a small Hindu temple.
sentences.cn: …一座小的印度教寺庙。

sentences.en: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.cn: 大火过后, 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存.

sentences.en: At Temple station, Charlotte rushed into the Ladies.
sentences.cn: 一到坦普尔站，夏洛特立即冲进了女厕所。

sentences.en: Can you tell us something about the history of the temple?
sentences.cn: 您能给我讲一讲这个庙宇的历史吗？

sentences.en: Hieroglyphics are carved into the walls of the temple.
sentences.cn: 寺庙的墙壁上刻着象形文字.

sentences.en: I found myself in an ancient temple.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己在一个古老的庙宇。

sentences.en: It is a temple of rare architectural beauty.
sentences.cn: 论建筑之美,那是一座极少有的寺院.

sentences.en: No one carrying arms is allowed within the precincts of a temple.
sentences.cn: 携带武器者不得进入神殿的界域。

sentences.en: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.cn: 那所佛教寺院位于市郊的最西北角.

sentences.en: She caught a clear view upwards of the spotlit temple.
sentences.cn: 她抬头清楚地看到了被聚光灯照得通明的寺庙。

sentences.en: The architectural structure of the Temple of Heaven is unique.
sentences.cn: 天坛的建筑结构很别致.

sentences.en: The chanting inside the temple stopped.
sentences.cn: 寺庙内的诵经声停了。

sentences.en: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.cn: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.en: The temple is supported by marble columns.
sentences.cn: 这座庙宇由大理石柱支撑。

sentences.en: the Temple of Diana at Ephesus
sentences.cn: 以弗所的狄安娜神庙

sentences.en: The temple was destroyed in the violent eruption of 1470 BC.
sentences.cn: 庙宇在公元前1470年猛烈的火山爆发中摧毁了.

sentences.en: They consecrated a temple to their god.
sentences.cn: 他们把庙奉献给神.

sentences.en: They fanned out and carefully combed the temple grounds.
sentences.cn: 他们呈扇形散开，在寺庙周围仔细搜寻。

sentences.en: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.cn: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.en: We go to temple on Saturdays.
sentences.cn: 我们每个星期六去寺庙。

sentences.en: We visited the ruins of the temple.
sentences.cn: 我们参观了那个庙宇的遗迹。

sentences.en: We went to the temple of Atlantis and saw it by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我们去了亚特兰蒂斯神殿，在月光下游览了一番。

phrases.tran_cn: 天普市（美国加利福尼亚州西南部城市）
天普大学（位于美国东岸宾夕法尼亚州的费城）

trans.tran_cn: 庙，寺，耶路撒冷古神殿，[犹太教] 犹太教聚会，太阳穴
trans.tran_en: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions
